alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 26 at 4:17AM PDT until October 28 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PDT FRIDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Oregon and southwest Washington. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM PDT Friday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation if left unprotected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Urban areas in the Portland and Vancouver metro area may remain just above freezing next couple of nights.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Greater Vancouver Area
